pariganaka sangarawe weleda danwim gana nosatathuta pala karana aya thamange rupiyal 50 gana sithanawa wagema me pa්rakashanaya pawathwagena yannata rupiyal koti gananak yodawa thibena samagamath thamange aayojanaya gana sithiya yuthuyi.
sha්ri lankawata chinaya pamanak nowa batahirath awashyayi.
akkayi malliyi kiyana sindu api ahala thiyenawa.
mama kata konakata sinawak nagagena ohu kiyapu kawiyata galapena anik kawiya kiwwa.
mama bonat eka uda wathirila, nilwan ahasa diha balan innawa, hathi damamin.
uba ithin rata padam karala dawal nidiyagannawane.
”me wage bothal hota dolpinla diya yatadi ma wetha oonatharam awith thiyenawa.

min kiyawenne apata samuhikathwayak pilibanda hangimak nathi aathmarthakamin pirisak bawa nowe.

madhya sathu me shakthiya prajathanthrawadaya wenuwen natha hoth janatha nidahasa wenuwen niyamakarayen bhawitha kirima madhyaye wagakimaki. 2015 janawari 08 dinata pera shri lankawe madhyayata ha madhyakaruwanta ella wu mardanayata erehiwa eda pawathi rajayata pananaguna wirodhatha, chodana thawamath awasan natha.

dhiwara ha jalaja sampath sanwardhana amathi waidya rajitha senarathna mahathage upades ha manga penwima yatathe beruwala, kaluthara saha panadura yana pradeshawala pasugiya 2012 warshaye di rupiyal laksha 400ka ifad aadhara matha wyapruthi rashiyak nimakara thibe.me pilibandawa “dinamina” ta adahas dakwu ifad kaluthara disthrik kalamanakara nil munasinha mahatha mese pawasiya.dhiwara ha jalaja sampath sanwardhana amathyanshayata ayath pashchath sunami werala punaruththapana ha sampath kalamanakara wadasatahana (ifad) prathipadana thulin sathipola sanwardhanaya kirima, marga sanwardhanaya, praja shala sanwardhanaya kirima, dhiwara sewa madhyasthana idikirima, wani wyapruthi pasugiya warshaye di nima kala.

ema nisa rajya ayojanaya wadi kirima, janathawage ithirikirim diri ganwima, rajaya ha paudgalika anshaye mana madihathwima, krushikarmika ha gramiya aarthikaya shakthimath kirima,rajya wyapara kalamanakaranaya swadhinakara karyakshama kirima, deshiya wyamaparikayan diri ganwa apanayana wadikirima, aanayanaya adu karana nishpadana wadi kirima athulath aarthika prathipaththi ape wikalpa wiya yuthuyi.

eeka thamayi aththatama wenne.mokada kohomada wela thiyenne kiyana eka hoyannama hithenawa.ee wisthara kalathurakin dakinawa wage neweyi nithara nithara asa gatena kota kiyawanakota aththatama wenne eeka samanya deyak wela apith nodanima api eekata anugatha wena eka.hariyata miyanta wasa orothaththu dunna wage.anthimata ape sanwedi bawa nathi wela yanawa aparadhayak as idaripitama wunath eeka samanya deyak widiyata salakana tharamata.ada daranu aparadha kiyala hithana dewal idiriyedi sulu aparadha bawata pathwenawa.mewata athapaya kapala marala daranu daduwami denna ona kiyala hithuwata eken wenneth passe bihiwena aparadhakarawo daduwamata anukulawa hadagahehanawa misaka aparadha aduwena eka neweyi.aarabiye prasiddiye dena daranu daduwami balanna ehe minissu hada gahila thiyanawa.meksikowe mathdrawya jawarami karayo kalli ekineka maraganne daranu wada dila.owun ee wada widinna hadagahila wagema thawathawath mathdrawya jawarama wyaptha wela thiyanawa.
